videos.headline: Pitt strikes first on 15-yard TD
videos.description: Nathan Peterman shovels it to George Aston for a 15-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Pitt ends Clemson drive with critical red zone interception
videos.description: Ryan Lewis intercepts Deshaun Watson's pass in the end zone.

videos.headline: Wayne Gallman plows into the end zone to tie the game
videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for 1 yd for a TD

videos.headline: Pitt makes 46-yard TD look easy against Clemson
videos.description: Nathan Peterman connects with James Conner for a 46-yard touchdown against No. 2 Clemson.

videos.headline: Lengthy replay review determines Clemson tying touchdown instead of Pitt defensive touchdown
videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for 1 yd for a TD

videos.headline: Clemson's Williams hauls in 15-yard TD pass
videos.description: Deshaun Watson throws a great pass to the end zone to an awaiting Mike Williams, who grabs a 15-yard touchdown to give Clemson its first lead of the game against Pitt.

videos.headline: Clemson's bizarre play ends in TD
videos.description: After Clemson loses possession of the ball in the end zone, Pitt returns the ball 100 yards for a TD only for it to be called back by officials and ruled a Clemson touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Clemson's bizarre play ends in TD) 2016/11/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pitt's Peterman delivers 55-yard TD pass
videos.description: Nathan Peterman connects with Scott Orndoff for a 55-yard touchdown in the second quarter against Clemson.

videos.headline: Pitt misses game tying extra point
videos.description: (C. Blewitt PAT MISSED)

videos.headline: Deshaun Watson throws second interception of the first half
videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass intercepted Avonte Maddox return for no gain to the Pitt 14

videos.headline: Pitt recaptures lead with 4th down score
videos.description: Nathan Peterman pass complete to George Aston for 1-yard for a TD

videos.headline: Watson connects with Scott for 13-yard TD
videos.description: Deshaun Watson has over 300 passing yards in the first half, including this 13-yard touchdown to Artavis Scott.

videos.headline: Pitt's Weah makes highlight-reel one-handed grab
videos.description: Jester Weah catches a 25-yard pass from Nathan Peterman with one hand.

videos.headline: Clemson forces strip sack
videos.description: Nathan Peterman sacked by Dorian O'Daniel for a loss of 2 yards to the Pitt 47 Nathan Peterman fumbled, forced by Dorian O'Daniel, recovered by Clem Dexter Lawrence , return for 0 yards

videos.headline: Jordan Whitehead leaves game with arm injury
videos.description: Jordan Whitehead leaves game with arm injury

videos.headline: First play after injury Watson finds Deon Cain for a 27-yard TD
videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Deon Cain for 27-yards for a TD

videos.headline: Pitt's Orndoff scores 7-yard TD after quick pass from Peterman
videos.description: Nathan Peterman connects with Scott Orndoff for a 7-yard score to cut Clemson's lead to one.

videos.headline: Clemson's Gallman punches in the TD
videos.description: Wayne Gallman rushes for a 1-yard touchdown to give Clemson the lead over Pitt in the third quarter.

videos.headline: Brightwell's pick at the goal line saves the day for Pitt
videos.description: With Clemson looking to make it a two-score game, Deshaun Watson gets picked off for the third time in the game, this one by Saleem Brightwell who nearly goes all the way to the house.

videos.headline: Pitt's Conner uses vicious stiff arm to set up 20-yard TD run
videos.description: Pitt's James Conner rushes 20 yards to the end zone, stiff arming a defender on the way, to get within two of Clemson.

videos.headline: Peterman crushed by defenders on 2 point try
videos.description: (Two-point Conversion failed )

videos.headline: Deshaun Watson breaks ACC single game passing record
videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Mike Williams for 7-yards to the Pitt 44 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Pitt stops 4th down and 1 attempt with under a minute left
videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for a loss of 1 yard to the Pitt 36

videos.headline: Blewitt nailed it!
videos.description: Chris Blewitt 48 yd FG GOOD

videos.headline: Pitt completes the upset!
videos.description: Pitt completes the upset!

videos.headline: Pitt coach Pat Narduzzi talks about his teams performance in their 43-42 upset win over Clemson
videos.description: Pitt coach Pat Narduzzi talks about his teams performance in their 43-42 upset win over Clemson

videos.headline: Clemson can't afford to lose again
videos.description: Heather Dinich explains where Clemson stands in the College Football Playoff after a loss to Pittsburgh.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Analysis (Clemson can't afford to lose again) 2016/11/12 SC

videos.headline: Pittsburgh upsets No. 2 Clemson on late FG
videos.description: Down 42-40, Pittsburgh's Chris Blewitt connects on a 48-yard field goal to send No. 2 Clemson to a 43-42 loss, their first defeat of the season.

videos.headline: Dabo: Loss is 'on me'
videos.description: Dabo Swinney takes the blame for Clemson's loss against Pittsburgh and talks about how the Tigers aren't used to losing at home.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Presser (Dabo: Loss is 'on me') 2016/11/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blewitt totally redeems himself on winning FG
videos.description: After missing an extra point and getting a field goal blocked, Chris Blewitt recovers with a game-winning field goal for Pittsburgh to shock No. 2 Clemson.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Blewitt totally redeems himself on winning FG) 2016/11/12 ESHEET ENHL
